user_timeline.tweet: Welcome to Dr. Valerie Vann, our newest faculty member at CTU Sioux Falls!
Celebrating Military Appreciation Week at CTU Sioux Falls.  The donation drive concludes tomorrow -see the front reception desk for details.
Promoting Health Week at CTU Sioux Falls with the Theme "Take Care of Yourself."  What are you doing today to take care of yourself?!
I just unlocked the Back to School badge on @foursquare! Time to party! Er, study. http://t.co/foooHIoO
CTU Board hosted a reception for students on campus last night - Board members were moved by the success stories our students shared!
Celebrating Student Appreciation Week at CTU Sioux Falls with walking tacos!  Discover walking tacos at 12 or 5 tomorrow - lounge area.
